[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-examples/diem-framework/crates/crypto/src/hkdf.rs] [Function: expand()] [Cache timing] Does the expand() operation access memory in patterns dependent on the PRK or info values, creating cache timing side-channels exploitable via Spectre/Meltdown-style attacks to extract validator private keys?
